ObjectClass.Name: Q-Plasma Transporter
ObjectClass.Description:
QP TRANSPORT BOX: Collect with a RP to gain resources
[60 QP / 60s / RP]

ObjectClass.Name: Q-Plasma Cell
ObjectClass.Description:
QP CONDENSER CELL: Collect with a RP to gain resources Consumes 100 QP to activate
Diminishing returns for additional RPs Maximum: 1 + 2 harvesters [60+30+30 QP / 60s]

ObjectClass.Name: Q-Plasma Transporter
ObjectClass.Description: QP TRANSPORT BOX: Collect with a RP to gain resources

Objective.Name: Human
Objective.Details: Play as the Humans:\Versatile masters of offense\Favor highly efficient, flexible ground forces\ \Easy to learn for new players

Objective.Name: Grekim
Objective.Details: Play as the Grekim:\Devious masters of timetravel\Rely on self-chronoportation and air power\ \Hardest to learn for new players

Objective.Name: Vecgir
Objective.Details: Play as the Vecgir:\Insular masters of teleportation\Exploit hypermobile self-teleporting vehicles\Powerful defensive structures and abilities\Intermediate difficulty for new players

Objective.Name: Random
Objective.Details: \Randomly select a species

ObjectClass.Name: Elder Shell - Achron
ObjectClass.Description:
ELDER SHELL: Achronal bio-cybernetic command shell
Coordinates landing operations for the new Grekim enclave
Shell can accommodate a fully Achronal Elder Guardian AI (i.e. you)

Objective.Name: Enable Vanguard Tech
Objective.Details: Reconfigures Grekim economy and static\defense abilities for evasive nomadic\warfare\(Not recommended for non-expert players)\Choose within 40s

Objective.Name: Produce Octo
Objective.Details: Biological melee assault trooper\Effective against ground targets\Good at absorbing enemy fire\Morphs into R.P or Dome\Invisible in Fog of War

Objective.Name: Produce Squiddy/Sepi
Objective.Details: Biological support shock trooper\High damage against air and ground units\Cloaks while moving\Morphs into Mound or Reaph\Invisible in Fog of War

Objective.Name: Produce Pharo
Objective.Details: Biological armored shock grenadier\Slow close-range splash anti-ground brawler\Cloak detector\Morphs into Spyre or Arcticus\Invisible in Fog of War

Objective.Name: Produce Octopod
Objective.Details: Biological main ground-assault armor\Mobile anti-ground heavy sniper\Progenerates advanced units\Morphs into Ghost

ObjectClass.Name: Landing Probe
ObjectClass.Description:
LANDING PROBE: Landing-action remote scout Determines where forces can be deployed
Detects cloaked units Can cloak to become a permanent asset

Objective.Name: Move
Objective.Details: \Move to specified location\ \Move Speed: 9 (aircraft)\Vision Range: 14, Aggro Radius: 0

Objective.Name: Attack
Objective.Details: Attack target or Attack-Move to location\ \[Weapons Avg Damage/10secs ]\Gnd: 600, R 15, SR 2, Sta C\Air: 600, R 15, SR 2, Sta C

Objective.Name: Patrol
Objective.Details: Hold CTRL and select up to 5 points to\continuously patrol around\Target one of your own units to HOLD\current position or select a single\location to HOLD that position

Objective.Name: Stop
Objective.Details: \Interrupt current objective\and return to idling

Objective.Name: Full-Cloak
Objective.Details: \Renders the Probe completely undetectable\ \Disables all other abilities\Cannot be reversed

Objective.Name: Nanite Infect
Objective.Details: \Infects the target with nanites,\taking control of the enemy

Objective.Name: Change Team
Objective.Details: \Change allegiance: \join the targeted unit's team

Objective.Name: Teleport
Objective.Details: Teleport to a specified location\ \Self-skipping requires line of sight\Using a Teleporter negates costs\Must not have a TSS

Objective.Name: Deploy Humans
Objective.Details: Play as the Humans:\Versatile masters of offense\Favor highly efficient, flexible ground forces\ \Easy to learn for new players

Objective.Name: Deploy Grekim
Objective.Details: Play as the Grekim:\Devious masters of timetravel\Rely on self-chronoportation and air power\ \Hardest to learn for new players

Objective.Name: Deploy Vecgir
Objective.Details: Play as the Vecgir:\Insular masters of teleportation\Exploit hypermobile self-teleporting vehicles\Powerful defensive structures and abilities\Intermediate difficulty for new players

Objective.Name: Deploy Random
Objective.Details: \Randomly select a species
